African Distillers bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya, ọkachasị mmanya na mmanya, na Zimbabwe.
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1944 dị ka "P J Joubert Limited", ụlọ ọrụ mbubata mmanya wee zụta ebe a na-ere mmanya na Mutare na 1946 wee malite imepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ n'onwe ya
Na 1974, African Distillers kwagara isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Stapleford

E mere atụmatụ na 1989 na African Distillers na-emepụta ihe dị ka karama mmanya 3 nde kwa afọ, ụzọ atọ n'ụzọ anọ nke ngụkọta mmanya ụlọ nke mba ahụ. Mmepụta mmanya nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na ubi vaịn Green Valley na Odzi.
Na Zimbabwe, African Distillers na-edobe ebe nchekwa isii, na Bulawayo, Harare, Kwekwe, Masvingo, Mutare na Victoria Falls
African Distillers na-arụ ọrụ ego atọ ma na-echekwa ụlọ ahịa, na Harare, Mutare na Bulawayo
Akụrụngwa nke African Distillers depụtara na Zimbabwe Stock Exchange, ebe ọ na-azụ ahịa n'okpuru akara AFDS ma bụrụ akụkụ nke Zimbabwe Industrial Index
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Machị afọ , ndị nwere òkè kachasị ukwuu na ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka egosiri na tebụl dị n'okpuru ebe a:
1→Afdis Holdings bụ Ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego nke Delta Corporation na Distell Group nwere
Dabere na ntinye aka ozugbo na nke na-apụtaghị ìhè na African Distillers, Delta Corporation na Distell Group njikwa dị mma nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ 50.44% na 30.04% n'otu n'otu.
